overview: There's enough hair flying through the air in this collection of extreme women's wrestling matches to prove that the so-called "fairer sex" is just as capable of dishing out mayhem as the men are. You'll see hardcore action from a long list of professional female wrestlers, including F.B.I. ("The Full-Breasted Italian"), Lucy Furr, Black Barbie, One Dirty Broad, Annie Social and Lauren Looselips.
title: Women's Extreme Wrestling: War
